Arsenal.desc: The Hunter has access to or can create a wide variety of weaponry

perks.name: Team Requisition
perks.desc: The Hunter can provide copies of the same weapon up to the margin of the win.

perks.name: Special Features
perks.desc: The weapon comes with a number of special features up to the margin of the win. Features could be a thermal scope or disguised case.

perks.name: Exotics
perks.desc: You possess a rare form of weaponry such as silver bullets or a ritual dagger.

perks.name: Untraceable
perks.desc: Any weapons procured are completely untraceable and will never lead back to the Cell.

Fleet.desc: The Hunter is able to provide a fleet of commercial or personal vehicles for the cell.

perks.name: Armor
perks.desc: Vehicles provided will be armored against small arms fire.

perks.name: Performance
perks.desc: Vehicles provided come with enhanced handling and driving, providing a bonus equal to the win amount. Provides bonuses to driving tests.

perks.name: Surveillance
perks.desc: Vehicles provided come with a broad range of concealed surveillance instruments. Provides bonuses to things like stakeouts.

perks.name: Untraceable
perks.desc: Any vehicles procured are completely untraceable and will never lead back to the Cell.

Ordnance.desc: The Hunter can build or acquire various types of explosives.

perks.name: Multiple Payloads
perks.desc: The hunter can provide additional copies of the same ordnance up to the margin of the win.

perks.name: Non-Lethal Munitions
perks.desc: This perk provides a wide range of non-lethal explosives like tear gas, flashbangs or knockout gas.

perks.name: Exotics
perks.desc: The Hunter can fill their explosives with rare or exotic contents such as consecrated water or sandalwood shrapnel.

perks.name: Disguised Delivery
perks.desc: Any explosive is disguised as everyday objects of appropriate size making them more difficult to detect.

Library.desc: The Hunter has access to a wealth of information surrounding the paranormal.

perks.name: Where They hide
perks.desc: Clues provide a bonus equal to the margin of the win when attempting to locate the lair of your prey.

perks.name: Who They Are
perks.desc: In addition to a clue gained you gain an additional bonus equal to the margin of the win when attempting to identify prey.

perks.name: How To Halt Them
perks.desc: In addition to a clue gained you gain an additional bonus equal to the margin of the win when attempting to ward an area, protect an area or poerson from your prey.

perks.name: How To Harm Them
perks.desc: In addition to a clue gained you gain an additional bonus equal to the margin of the win when attempting to harm the prey by exploiting a supernatural weakness.

Improvised Gear.desc: The Hunter is exceptionally skilled at creating useful, short-lived tools from nearby materials.

perks.name: Frugal
perks.desc: The Hunter is able to construct most items out of the trinkets and tools they carry, no matter how bare their location.

perks.name: Mass Production
perks.desc: The Hunter is able to create a number of additional items equal to the margin of the test.

perks.name: Specialization
perks.desc: The Hunter can specialize in augmenting a particular Skill

perks.name: Speed Crafting
perks.desc: With this Perk, the Hunter can craft a tool in three turns, minus the margin on the test, to a minimum of one turn, regardless of outside circumstances such as bullets flying.

Global Access.desc: The Hunter is able to gain access to any digital system well-beyond simple 'hacking'.

perks.name: Watching Big Brother
perks.desc: The Hunter is able to not only gain access to but also manipulate digital surveillance footage.

perks.name: All-Access Pass
perks.desc: The Hunter can bypass electronic locks and disable or manipulate alarm systems and other security countermeasures.

perks.name: Money Tap
perks.desc: The Hunter can manipulate financial data and move currency with the push of a button. Can be used offensively and defensively.

perks.name: The Letter of the Law
perks.desc: The Hunter can manipulate criminal records, both national and international.

Drone Jockey.desc: The Hunter owns and excels in piloting drones.

perks.name: Autonomous
perks.desc: The Hunter is able to program simple behaviours into their drone, such as patrol-and-attack patterns or tailing.

perks.name: Variants
perks.desc: Each copy of this Perk allows an additional drone variant (complete with two Skills, which can differ among the variant drones) to be acquired.

perks.name: Specialist Skill
perks.desc: The drone can utilize an additional Skill.

perks.name: Armaments
perks.desc: A drone variant can be armed with the equivalent of a submachine gun or a taser, using a flat five-dice pool to use it.

perks.name: Payload
perks.desc: The drone can carry a unit of cargo many times what its size suggests.

perks.name: System
perks.desc: On acquiring this Edge, the Hunter must choose one type of animal and which key action pools it possesses.

Beast Whisperer.desc: The Hunter has a way with animals. They can speak to, command and befriend certain animals.

perks.name: Incorruptible
perks.desc: Through conditioning, medication, or unwavering loyalty, the animal is immune to supernatural powers that would otherwise sway it from its master's side.

perks.name: Menagerie
perks.desc: The Hunter can choose another animal type and add it to the available pool of animals they have available

perks.name: Complex Commands
perks.desc: The animal can understand and execute more complex commands, such as the retrieval of specific objects, keeping a lookout for certain individuals.

perks.name: Incognito
perks.desc: The animal can masterfully stay out of sight.

Sense the Unnatural.desc: By holding an object of focus, the Hunter is able to sense the presence of supernatural creatures within close vicinity.

perks.name: Creature Specialization
perks.desc: The Hunter gains a two-dice bonus to sense a specific type of creature.

perks.name: Range
perks.desc: The range of the ability is extended to cover roughly the size of a city block.

perks.name: Precision
perks.desc: The Hunter is able to determine exactly who among those present in a room is a creature of the supernatural.

perks.name: Handsfree
perks.desc: The Hunter no longer needs to rely on an object of focus to use this Edge.

Repel the Unnatural.desc: The Hunter is able to use their object of focus to repel and terrify supernatural creatures.

perks.name: Ward
perks.desc: The Hunter can extend the area of protection to include an area roughly 2 meters around them. Effects all in range.

perks.name: Damage
perks.desc: While this power is active, the Hunter can use their object of focus as a melee weapon with +0 damage, inflicting Aggravated damage to the creature under its effect.

perks.name: Creature Specialization
perks.desc: The Hunter gains a two-dice bonus to repel a specific type of creature.

perks.name: Handsfree
perks.desc: The Hunter no longer needs to rely on an object of focus to use this Edge.

Thwart the Unnatural.desc: The Hunter owns and excels in piloting drones.

perks.name: Creature Specialization
perks.desc: The Hunter gains a two-dice bonus to resist a specific type of creature.

perks.name: Ward
perks.desc: The Hunter can extend the area of protection to include an area roughly 2 meters around them. Effects all in range.

perks.name: Recognition
perks.desc: On successfully resisting an ability, the Hunter is made aware of the attempt and what the power would have done to them.

perks.name: Handsfree
perks.desc: The Hunter no longer needs to rely on an object of focus to use this Edge.

Artifact.desc: The Hunter possesses a rare and powerful artifact of old.

perks.name: Empower
perks.desc: Once per scene, the Hunter can make an Edge Test at Difficulty 4 to increase the Artifact's dice bonus to three dice.

perks.name: Attraction
perks.desc: The Artifact is sought after by any number of supernatural parties. It can be used as bait, and provides a two-dice bonus to any ambush attempts.

perks.name: Detection
perks.desc: The Artifact reacts to the presence of the supernatural, similar to the Sense the Unnatural Edge.

perks.name: Shield
perks.desc: The Artifact shields the Hunter from harm by supernatural forces.
